Description: Powered by Frooition.com Shop Categories CORUM GOLDEN BRIDGE CERAMIC WATCH 113.161.15./0001 000R Item Description Corum Golden Bridge Ceramic Watch 113.161.15/0001 000R Up for sale Corum Bridges Golden Bridge Ceramic Case Watch. This watch is 34mm x 51mm in Black Cearmic and 5N 18K red gold Movement and Crown. The watch is 11.35mm thick, transparent back with glare proof sapphire crystal, black ceramic bezel, clear dial and caliber co 113 hand-wound movement. It is on a black Crocodile Strap and has a power reserve of approximately 40 hours. This piece has never been worn. Serial Numer: 2305XXX Model:113.161.15/0001 000R Caliber: CO 113 Movement: Manual Wind Case: Titanium Case 34mm x 51mm, with exhibition window on back and sides. Crystal: Sapphire Dial: No dial. Bracelet: Black Crocodile Bezel: Black Ceramic Condition: This timepiece is in new condition. It has never been worn. See all pictures and ask any questions you may have.
